title: Standard Deviation
text: Standard deviation displays how dispersed data is by explaining how far the data is from the mean.

title: Standard Deviation and Z-Scores
text: Standard deviation and $$z-scores$$ are related because your $$z-score$$ is dependent on the standard deviation. Data lower than the mean will have a negative $$z-score$$ determined using the standard deviation value. The same is done for values above the mean, which will have both positive standard deviation and $$z-score$$.

title: Determining Z-Scores
text: A $$z-score$$ measures how many standard deviations a value is above or below the mean value.
